name: 25–28.9" Wide Adjustable Monitor Hood - Enhances Privacy & Reduces Glare (Measured by Width, Not Diagonal)
short_description: Fits Monitors 25–28.9" Wide – Measured by width, not diagonal. Compatible with flat screens and curved monitors with a radius of 1900R or greater.
Reduces Glare & Eye Strain – Blocks ambient light from overhead and side sources to improve screen visibility and reduce fatigue.
Improves Privacy – Helps shield sensitive information from side glances in shared workspaces or public settings.
Enhances Visual Accuracy – Optimizes color perception and contrast for designers, gamers, and video editors.
Durable & Lightweight Design – Made from high-quality materials that are easy to install and remove without damaging your monitor.
product_description: Reduce Glare. Enhance Focus. Protect Privacy. Photodon's Adjustable Office Monitor Hood is designed to improve screen visibility and comfort in indoor workspaces. Made from lightweight, high-density fiberboard with a neutral gray, light-absorbing interior, it effectively blocks ambient light and reduces glare-enhancing color accuracy and screen clarity. Ideal for professionals in color-critical fields like photography, design, and development, as well as for data-sensitive environments such as medical offices and customer service centers. Professional-Grade Performance Glare Reduction - Blocks overhead and side lighting to reduce eye strain and improve screen clarity. Privacy Enhancement - Deep visor design helps shield sensitive data from side views. Color Accuracy - Neutral gray interior improves color perception and saturation for design-critical tasks. Easy Installation & Flexible Fit Adjustable Width - Compatible with monitors 25-28.9 inches wide (measured by width, not diagonal). Compatible with flat screens and curved monitors with a radius of 1900R or greater. Quick Setup - Comes fully assembled with pre-attached elastic cords for secure mounting. Portable Design - Folds flat for easy storage and transport. Product Highlights Made from high-density fiberboard with a matte black exterior and gray interior 8-inch visor depth for optimal shading and privacy Designed and manufactured in the USA About Photodon: Photodon is a small business with over 25 years of experience in sourcing the highest quality monitor hoods, screen protectors and privacy filters. We proudly craft our products in the USA using premium materials to ensure durability, precision, and long-lasting performance. We believe that screen protection should go beyond scratch resistance—it should enhance your viewing experience, safeguard your privacy, and support long-term eye health. That’s why we offer a wide range of products to meet your specific needs. From our responsive customer support to our thoughtfully designed installation kits, every detail reflects our dedication to quality and care. Whether you're protecting a single device or outfitting an entire office, Photodon is here to help you see clearly and securely.

name: Keenso Monitor Hood, Action Camera Screen Hood Sun Shade Anti Glare Foldable Magnetic Screen Protector with Sturdy ABS Material for 360 Ace Pro 2
short_description: Premium Materials: This monitor hood is made from ABS material. It's built to withstand rough handling and extreme conditions. Its sturdy construction ensures reliable performance, allowing you to focus on capturing stunning footage

Lightweight and Unobstructed: This hood's ultra-lightweight design adds virtually no bulk to your camera, ensuring uninterrupted filming. Its stylish design maintains the camera's flexibility, making it ideal for dynamic scenarios
Foldable Design: This monitor hood's innovative foldable design folds down to a compact size when not in use. With just one hand, it quickly unfolds for comprehensive sun protection

Strong Magnetic Mount: This action camera screen sunshade features a strong magnetic plate that securely attaches to your camera in seconds. The powerful magnet ensures a stable, shaky fit, even during intense activities

Compatible Model: Designed specifically for the Ace Pro 2 action camera, this hood provides optimal protection from harsh sunlight and glare. Its precise fit ensures comprehensive coverage, making it ideal for outdoor adventures and action photography

name: Computer Monitor Sunshade, Foldable Anti-Glare Monitor Hood,Adjustable Width, Anti-Glare,Desktop 17-27 Inch (41-71 Cm) Width Sun Visor
short_description: --Triple-sided light shielding restores screen's true colours: The triple-sided light shield design effectively blocks overhead and side glare, restoring the screen's true colours and eliminating reflection issues during work.

--Reduces light pollution to enhance colour and contrast perception: The light shield diminishes ambient light around the screen, making the monitor's native contrast and colour gamut more pronounced. This is particularly crucial for professional users in design, photography, and similar fields.
--Widened side wings restrict viewing angles to prevent peeping and safeguard privacy: The winged design limits the screen's visible angle, deterring others from viewing content from the sides.
-- Universal compatibility for 41-71cm straight-screen monitors: The 41-71cm sliding rail clamp extends freely, accommodating mainstream straight-screen monitors from 24 to 32 inches.
-- Advanced velour coating technology for exceptional light absorption: Utilises velour technology to minimise reflections, enhancing colour, sharpness, and contrast quality in the display.

short_description: Enhanced Light Control with 180° Adjustable Panels：Featuring side panels with a full 180° adjustment range, this monitor hood allows you to easily customize light blocking for any setup. Combined with a robust adhesive base, it ensures exceptional stability, creating a distraction-free and comfortable viewing environment.

Professional Anti-Glare & Reflection Reduction：Effectively blocks ambient light and minimizes screen reflections, delivering a more realistic and immersive visual experience. This enhanced clarity is ideal for professionals, designers, and anyone seeking superior screen accuracy and reduced visual interference.

Perfect Fit for 24 to 27-Inch Monitors：Specifically engineered to fit most 24-inch to 27-inch computer monitors, this sunshade offers a seamless and secure installation. Its universal compatibility makes it an ideal upgrade for gamers, office workers, and home users looking to optimize their screen visibility.

Eye Comfort & Fatigue Reduction：Designed with a black matte interior that absorbs stray light and reduces glare, this hood actively helps minimize eye strain and skin irritation during extended screen use. It promotes a healthier, more focused workspace for long hours of computing, gaming, or editing.

Privacy Protection & Immersive Viewing：Beyond improving picture quality, this hood also acts as a privacy shield to prevent unwanted side viewing. It’s a perfect accessory for photographers, movie enthusiasts, and professionals handling sensitive information, ensuring an immersive and private viewing experience.

name: 17–27 Inch Foldable Adjustable Monitor Hood | Privacy Sunshade (Fits 16.15–27.95in W/41–71cm, ≤14.17in H/≤36cm) | Not for Curved Monitors
short_description: This professional monitor hood is specially tailored for 17–27 inch monitors, and is compatible with the vast majority of monitors available on the market. It fits monitors with a left-and-right bezel width of 16.15–27.95 inches (41–71 cm) and a height of ≤ 14.17 inches (≤ 36 cm). To avoid product mismatch, please carefully check the specifications and measure your monitor before making a purchase.

Reduces dizziness and eye fatigue, blocks prying eyes, and shields monitors from dust. Made of ultra-light yet durable polyethylene, this monitor hood is shatter-resistant and damage-proof—withstanding daily wear and tear without cracking, breaking or wearing out. Fitting most 17–27 inch monitors on the market, it remains usable even when you replace your monitor later.

Boost Image ClarityCut ambient light interference, block stray light around the monitor, and eliminate screen reflections and glare. Eye Protection & Fatigue ReliefReduce visual discomfort from screen flicker and glare, ease eye dryness and soreness, and enhance overall eye comfort. Deepen Immersion & FocusThe hood creates a semi-enclosed visual space to filter out distractions, letting you fully concentrate on on-screen content while working, watching movies or gaming.
No tools or adhesives required—simply fasten the included adjustable straps in a crisscross pattern to the back of your monitor for quick, secure installation of the hood.
Quality Guarantee：This product supports 30-day hassle-free returns. For returns, please ensure the original packaging and labels remain intact.
